nodes.text: The CorSec Outpost was a space station operated by the Corellian Security Force near Corellia in the Corellian system.
Traders of the Miners Alliance aboard the station bought asteroid resources from independent space miners.

The CorSec Outpost is a space station in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, located in the Corellian system. When the game's second add-on, Rage of the Wookiees was released, it added the ability to mine asteroids for various resources. The developers also added Mining Stations to most of the game's star systems to provide the players with an easy way of selling these resources for credits. Only few players however sell asteroid resources to such stations, as the prices paid by other players are significantly higher.
The station cannot be entered and when hailed only gives the option to sell asteroid resources.
